metadata.title: CVE-2017-12067 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Potrace 1.14 has a heap-based buffer over-read in the interpolate_cubicfunction in mkbitmap.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12067` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpotrace0 - 1.15-1
potrace - 1.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: potrace package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15-1').
